code: import*as buttonActions from"../actions/types/button-types";export default function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:false;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;if(action.type===buttonActions.PRESSED_START){return action.payload.playing;}else if(action.type===buttonActions.PRESSED_STOP){return action.payload.playing;}return state;}
